DOC.brief_summary: This project broadly explore efficacy community participation design implementation intervention improve physical activity nutrition among immigrant refugee ( Hispanic , Somali , Sudanese , Cambodian ) family Rochester , Minnesota
DOC.brief_title: Healthy Immigrant Families : Working Together To Move More To Eat Well
DOC.criteria: Minimum age 11 year old Reside household least one adult one child ( 1118 ) Not plan move area next two year Willing able participate aspect study Willingness provide oral informed consent Hispanic , Sudanese , Somali Residing Rochester , MN Selfreported pregnancy Selfreported insulindependent diabetes Selfreported diagnosis cancer within past 3 year Answer `` yes '' follow question : `` Do know reason physical activity ? For example , would unsafe increased physical activity health problem ? ''
